name: Trouble Cargo
description:
Another job to deliver valuable research material to remote science station. What can go wrong?

Little adventure story in space. No words, just images. Game is fully completed and have about 10-30 minutes of gameplay. Hope you will like it.

I decide to change gameplay from arcade to adventure game because its more interesting for me. Also you can find here such features as: 

  • A lot of new graphic;
  • Many interactable objects (for such a little game);
  • Story driven progress with animations and map changes;
  • Dynamic sound and lights;
  • Enemy that have 2 ways to defeat you;
  • Music (use TV to change it).

Created by Mikhail Gorbunov.

Control:

Move by WASD.

Interact with objects by E.

Use flashlight by F (If you have one).

All you need to do is to follow character thoughts.

AND REMEMBER - You have only one life in this world.

Versions:

V1.2: More bugfix.

V1.1: New menu, fonts and some bugfix.

v1: full game
